meanings.definition: To create a new version of a musical recording by altering or adding to the original.
meanings.sent1: She enjoys remixing songs to make them sound different.
meanings.sent2: The DJ is remixing a popular track for the dance party.
meanings.sent3: The musician was remixing the song so much that it started to sound like a completely new tune.
meanings.sent4: His remixing of the classic hit gave it a fresh and modern twist.
meanings.sent5: The art of remixing music requires creativity and skill to produce unique sounds.

meanings.sent1: After baking, she realized she forgot to remix the ingredients properly.
meanings.sent2: The chef is remixing the spices to enhance the flavor of the dish.
meanings.sent3: He kept remixing the colors on the canvas until he achieved the perfect blend.
meanings.sent4: The painter's remixing of shades created a mesmerizing effect on the artwork.
meanings.sent5: Remixing the elements of a recipe can lead to surprising and delicious results.
